statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 58500. If she receives a raise of 4600 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-58500 = 41500. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{41500}}{{4600}}={9.0217391304348} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 10 years.
